foodcatering_package

Interface custtomer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    customer, Guest, LoyaltyCustomer

    public interface custtomer
    contain of common function of loyal customer and guest customer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CancelOrder(int code)
      function that canceled order on condition before the delivery date by at least 24 hours
      void displayCustomerOrders()
      function to display information for customer orders and information of items that founded in this orders
      void displayWishlist()
      function to display favorite items from wishlist for this customer
      void favouritItem(java.lang.String fav)
      function to add favorite item name in wishlist array for this customer
      int searchOrder(int code)
      function that search in order with order code because customer can has many orders
      void UpdateOrder(int extra, int code)
      function overloading that update delivery date of order
      void UpdateOrder(java.lang.String obj, int code)
      function that update orders with other item required by customer

    • Method Detail

      • CancelOrder

        void CancelOrder(int code)
        function that canceled order on condition before the delivery date by at least 24 hours
        Parameters:
        code - code for order that you want to canceled

      • UpdateOrder

        void UpdateOrder(java.lang.String obj,
                 int code)
        function that update orders with other item required by customer
        Parameters:
        obj - name of item that user wanted to added to his order
        code - code for order that user want to update it

      • UpdateOrder

        void UpdateOrder(int extra,
                 int code)
        function overloading that update delivery date of order
        Parameters:
        extra - number of days that customer wanted to extend his order by it
        code - code for order that user want to update it

      • searchOrder

        int searchOrder(int code)
        function that search in order with order code because customer can has many orders
        Parameters:
        code - code for this order

      • favouritItem

        void favouritItem(java.lang.String fav)
        function to add favorite item name in wishlist array for this customer
        Parameters:
        fav - name of favorite item
